tool.name: Compute window statistics
tool.description: on data in a Wiggle file
tool.help:
This tool calculates the arithmetic mean, maximum, or minimum value for the Wig data in each interval. For each Wig file provided, an additional column is added to the output file in the order that they are added.
.. class:: infomark
**TIP:** If your dataset does not appear in the pulldown menu, it means that it is not in Wig or BigWig format. Use "edit attributes" to set the correct format if it was not detected correctly.
